name: Turning Red
description:
Adorable face of the red panda and the vibrant red color of #TurningRed inspired me so much that I couldn't resist making it purely in Figma.


Pixar's characters and colours are top-notch in every movie. This movie says -

Let the world see who you really are without caring about what anyone else thinks.


Learn and Discuss more on discord https://discord.gg/Dcyunhn8zY
